ssot__ShoppingCartEventType__dlm.name: Shopping Cart Event Type
ssot__ShoppingCartEventType__dlm.description: The Shopping Cart Event Type DMO represents a customer interaction with a shopping cart on a commerce site.

ssot__DataSourceId__c.description: A reference ID for the logical name for a system that is the source of records identified by external record ID.

ssot__DataSourceObjectId__c.description: A reference ID for the logical name of the object where this record came from, whether that is a name of a cloud storage file or another connectorâ€™s external object.

ssot__InternalOrganizationId__c.description: A reference ID to the business unit or other internal organization that owns the business account.

ssot__Name__c.description: The name of the shopping cart event type, for example added product to cart, cart viewed, or product removed from cart.

ssot__Id__c.description: A unique ID used as primary key for the Shopping Cart Event Type DMO.
